00140 int CreateROOTFH4( nfs_fh4 * fh, 
00141                    compound_data_t * data )
00142 {
00143   pseudofs_entry_t   psfsentry ;
00144   int status = 0 ;
00145   char fhstr[LEN_FH_STR] ;
00146   
00147   psfsentry = * (data->pseudofs->reverse_tab[0]) ;
00148 
00149   if( ( status = nfs4_AllocateFH( &(data->rootFH  ) ) ) != NFS4_OK )
00150     return status ;
00151   
00152   if( !nfs4_PseudoToFhandle( &(data->rootFH  ), &psfsentry ) )
00153     {
00154       return NFS4ERR_BADHANDLE ;
00155     }
00156   
00157     /* Test */
00158 #ifdef _DEBUG_NFS_V4
00159   nfs4_sprint_fhandle( &data->rootFH, fhstr ) ;
00160   DisplayLog( "CREATE ROOTFH: %s", fhstr ) ;
00161 #endif
00162 
00163   return NFS4_OK ;
00164 } /* CreateROOTFH4 */

00167 
00184 #define arg_PUTROOTFH4 op->nfs_argop4_u.opputrootfh
00185 #define res_PUTROOTFH4 resp->nfs_resop4_u.opputrootfh
00186 
00187 int nfs4_op_putrootfh(  struct nfs_argop4 * op ,   
00188                         compound_data_t   * data, 
00189                         struct nfs_resop4 * resp)
00190 {
00191   int                  error;
00192   
00193   char funcname[] = "nfs4_op_putrootfh" ;
00194   char fhstr[LEN_FH_STR] ;
00195   int i ;
00196   
00197   /* This NFS4 Operation has no argument, it just get then ROOTFH (replace MOUNTPROC3_MNT) */
00198   
00199   /* First of all, set the reply to zero to make sure it contains no parasite information */
00200   memset( resp, 0, sizeof( struct nfs_resop4 ) ) ;
00201   
00202   resp->resop = NFS4_OP_PUTROOTFH ;
00203   resp->nfs_resop4_u.opputrootfh.status =  NFS4_OK  ;
00204   
00205   if( ( error = CreateROOTFH4( &(data->rootFH), data) ) != NFS4_OK )
00206     {
00207       res_PUTROOTFH4.status = error ;
00208       return res_PUTROOTFH4.status ;
00209     }
00210   data->current_entry = NULL ; /* No cache inode entry for the directory within pseudo fs */
00211   data->current_filetype = DIR_BEGINNING ; /* Only directory in the pseudo fs */
00212      
00213   /* I copy the root FH to the currentFH and, if not already done, to the publicFH */
00214   /* For the moment, I choose to have rootFH = publicFH */
00215   /* For initial mounted_on_FH, I'll use the rootFH, this will change at junction traversal */
00216   if( data->currentFH.nfs_fh4_len == 0 )
00217     {
00218       if( ( error = nfs4_AllocateFH( &(data->currentFH) ) ) != NFS4_OK )
00219         {
00220           resp->nfs_resop4_u.opputrootfh.status = error ;
00221           return error ;
00222         }
00223     }
00224   memcpy( (char *)(data->currentFH.nfs_fh4_val), (char *)(data->rootFH.nfs_fh4_val), data->rootFH.nfs_fh4_len ) ;
00225   data->currentFH.nfs_fh4_len = data->rootFH.nfs_fh4_len ;
00226    
00227   if( data->mounted_on_FH.nfs_fh4_len == 0 )
00228     {
00229       if( ( error = nfs4_AllocateFH( &(data->mounted_on_FH) ) ) != NFS4_OK )
00230         {
00231           resp->nfs_resop4_u.opputrootfh.status = error ;
00232           return error ;
00233         }
00234     }
00235   memcpy( (char *)(data->mounted_on_FH.nfs_fh4_val), (char *)(data->rootFH.nfs_fh4_val), data->rootFH.nfs_fh4_len ) ;
00236   data->mounted_on_FH.nfs_fh4_len = data->rootFH.nfs_fh4_len ;
00237   
00238    
00239   if( data->publicFH.nfs_fh4_len == 0 )
00240     {
00241       if( ( error = nfs4_AllocateFH( &(data->publicFH) ) ) != NFS4_OK )
00242         {
00243           resp->nfs_resop4_u.opputrootfh.status = error ;
00244           return error ;
00245         }
00246     }
00247   /* Copy the data where they are supposed to be */
00248   memcpy( (char*)(data->publicFH.nfs_fh4_val), (char *)(data->rootFH.nfs_fh4_val), data->rootFH.nfs_fh4_len ) ;
00249   data->publicFH.nfs_fh4_len = data->rootFH.nfs_fh4_len ;
00250   
00251     /* Test */
00252 #ifdef _DEBUG_NFS_V4
00253   nfs4_sprint_fhandle( &data->rootFH, fhstr ) ;
00254   DisplayLog( "NFS4 PUTROOTFH: rootFH=%s", fhstr ) ;
00255   nfs4_sprint_fhandle( &data->currentFH, fhstr ) ;
00256   DisplayLog( "NFS4 PUTROOTFH: currentFH=%s", fhstr ) ;
00257 #endif
00258 
00259   DisplayLogJdLevel( data->pclient->log_outputs, 
00260                      NIV_FULL_DEBUG, "NFS4 PUTROOTFH: Ending on status %d", resp->nfs_resop4_u.opputrootfh.status ) ;
00261   
00262   return  resp->nfs_resop4_u.opputrootfh.status ;
00263 } /* nfs4_op_putrootfh */
00264 
00265 
00276 void nfs4_op_putrootfh_Free( PUTROOTFH4res * resp )
00277 {
00278   /* Nothing to be done */
00279   return ;
00280 } /* nfs4_op_putrootfh_Free */
